data.title: A "must visit"!
data.text: Enstroms' is a must visit for all who come to visit Grand Junction!  They have a lovely shop with many chocolate, candy, tea, and coffee items.  hey have an a viewing area where you can watch the magic!  There is always a supply of their famous toffee to sample, as well as a coffee bar with pastries.  And, for those craving ice cream, they have a nice selection of that, too. This is always a stop for our out of state visitors.  Last time, we brought them back 4 times!  Their incredible toffee makes a perfect souvenir to take home!

data.title: Local favorite
data.text: Enstrom's is a very unique local candy manufacturer. The milk chocolate toffee is addictive. I've sent this to friends in California and Texas and always have great responses. It's a special treat and they have many varieties.

data.title: Best chocolates ever
data.text: enstroms make there own chocolates right here in grand junction. Best chocolates. Go t here and get a box well worth it

data.title: Outstanding products, great people and wonderful community citizens
data.text:
This is a gem for those of us in business in Western Colorado.  Matters not where my clients come in from, they always write letters about the toffee we gift to them after their visit.

You can never go wrong with this confectionery!

data.title: Great Toffee and Ice Cream
data.text: We stopped here for the ice cream.  I read about the monthly sundae in one of the reviews and wanted to check on that.  In September, it was German Chocolate ice cream with chocolate topping, whipped cream, nuts and a cherry.  It was delicious (and cheap).  We tried a sample of the almond toffee and loved it.  The texture, quality, and taste was amazing.  It wasn't hard or chewy like some toffee.  I don't even like toffee, but I thought this was great.  We left with a box and wished we had purchased a bigger box after a few days.   Be sure to make a stop here if you are in Grand Junction.

data.title: Best candy anywhere!
data.text: You can't go wrong here. It's just a retail store, not really an attraction. But if you want great treats, this is the place. Everything is delic!

data.title: Great coffee and everything for your sweet-tooth!
data.text: I go often for coffee, be sure and get your punchcard, and something sweet.  The free wifi makes it the perfect place to meet up with a friend and visit while you check emails and catch up on the latest news.  It's fun to watch the worker's make tableful batches of everyone's favorite almond toffee.  I will sometimes get a lemon bar or other pastry from the case.  But most often, it's a small sack of three or four (okay, five or six sometimes) chocolate treats.  Enstrom's has another location on First and Patterson I sometimes visit; but my favorite is right downtown.  That way I can enjoy my coffee ans sweets and that take a nice walk to look at the art!

data.title: Best Candy Ever
data.text: The almond toffee is world famous and I have never had any better.  The ice cream is fabulous and in fact I have never had anything from Enstom's that was not fabulous.

data.title: Best Candy- Ice Cream- Coffee- Tea
data.text: This is a "Must Stop" in downtown Grand Junction.  This 4 generation-family owned business is loved by the community!   They ship their Almond Toffee all over the world.  It is the best place to take a break for some incredible treats and beverages.  If you're lucky you will be able to view the candy masters making the famous toffee through the large windows in the in the beautiful shop.   Lucky for you they have samples of the delicious toffee!   If it's a beautiful day out- they have tables and chairs for you to enjoy the treats and gorgeous dowtown area.

data.title: Like a kid in a candy shop
data.text: OK we bought to much chocolate but who can blame us? This place is great. Long history in town. Storefront attached to the facility. Fun looking through all the candy, ice cream and coffee.

data.title: Chocolate and coffee - what else?
data.text:
Excellent chocolate specializing in Toffee. Everyone sends this to friends and relatives when they travel.  

Delicious and so fun to watch it made in large copper kettles, poured out on tables and worked while you eat the delicious candy, ice cream and have a coffee or tea. YUM YUM!!

data.title: Best toffee and ice cream
data.text: We have been here at least a hundred times. Excellent chocolate, toffee, ice cream and a great candy selection. They have a nice area to enjoy your selection and a coffee bar. They now have chocolate prices listed. You can even watch them make the toffee through the large window.

data.title: Sundae  of the Month
data.text: Enstrom's is the place to go for toffee - but if you go during the day (not at lunchtime) you can watch it being made - mesmerizing!  Every month is a Sundae of the month, the one scoop sundae is only $2.75 which is a steal, sometimes it comes in a waffle bowl too - with homemade caramel or hot fudge topping - best dessert deal in town!  Also if you get a punch card you can earn free cones.  (Free WI-Fi too)

data.title: Best toffey EVER!!!
data.text: Enstrom's has some of the best toffey I have ever tasted! Very smooth, buttery, and just the right amount of sweetness, topped off with almonds!!!! Spectacular!!!

data.title: This review pertains to their Fruita, Colorado Location
data.text: This store may be smaller than their main location in Grand Junction but has everything you could possibly want!   Their wonderful toffee,  ice cream and anything else you could imagine.  The lady staffing the store was really helpful as well!

data.title: Amazing Sweet Treats!
data.text: Enstrom's is known globally for its ridiculously good almond roca candy. Its since added more site made candies, plus other specialty candy items.  Enstrom's also makes wicked good, ice creams also on site.  If in GJ, its worth stopping in for a treat, and to watch the almond roca candy being made by hand.

data.title: Delicious and affordable
data.text: We take our kids here all the time because the ice cream portions are generous, and price is fair. Check out all the cute delicacies and gifts in their store.

data.title: Make This a Don't Miss!
data.text: A small but very well stocked facility displaying their on-site made candies. Well known for their toffee and large variety of assorted candies, they also have a coffee and espresso bar and an ice cream counter. A short walk from Main Street.

data.title: YUM YUM YUM!!!  ABSOLUTELY THE BEST EVER ALMOND TOFFEE!
data.text:
Enstrom's  makes the world's best almond toffee! They also have ice cream which is scrumptious!  The toffee ice cream is our favorite...rich & creamy with toffee pieces!!  You cannot visit the store without treating yourself to this ice cream!  

It was well worth a trip from Colorado Springs to indulge ourselves for my wife's birthday!  The Grand Junction location is the company headquarters where they offer a wide assortment of Enstrom-made candies, in addition to other brands. We enjoyed the ability to watch the candy making process...a new addition to the customer experience. 

The product quality makes it worth the price!

data.title: Best Latte in town, homemade ice cream too!
data.text: Friendly, professional staff, quality coffee drinks, homemade ice cream and craft made chocolate. Always a great stop when in downtown Grand Junction
